ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 16 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS 70D Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-135mm IS STM Lens + <2> Canon EF 75-300mm III Lens + <3> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <4> Spare LP-E6 Battery +
<5> Battery Charger for LP-E6 + <6> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <7> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <8> PD DSLR Sling Backpack +
<9> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <10> 67mm UV Filter + <11> 58mm UV Filter + <12> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader +
<13> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <14> LCD Screen Protectors + <15> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <16> 67-58mm Step-Down Adapter Ring
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 70D Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-135mm IS STM Lens with 75-300mm Lens + 64GB Card + Battery & Charger + Backpack + Tripod + Tele/Wide Lenses + Kit
